Tool

NameInverse Principle Components Rotation
ID10
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2011
Specificationgrid

Description

Inverse principle components rotation for grids. References: Bahrenberg, G., Giese, E., Nipper, J. (1992): Statistische Methoden in der Geographie 2 - Multivariate Statistik. pp.198-277.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Principle Components Grid list (input)PCA
